comments:
Open the new editor.  Go to the build configuration page.
In the bin section, check a file.

You will get the following class cast exception:

It should - that's the idea. Undo manager should react to all the undos in all 
the models. That's why I added 'getChangeProvider' method so that I can get to 
the model from the model event. I will fix this problem but the overall design 
is correct.
